#define MTU   1500
 Packet size limits. The total packet length must be less than the maximum transmission unit (MTU).

#define MTU   1500

Packet size limits. The total packet length must be less than the maximum transmission unit (MTU).

Function Documentation

int fish_l1_send ( void *  frame  ) 

fish_l1_send sends a L2+ frame through the fishnet overlay.

  • frame A pointer to the L2 frame to send. It will not be modified or freed by this function.
    Returns:
    0 on success and -1 on failure
    This function will not accept invalid frame, including frames whose length is greater than the MTU. The fishnode must be in the main event loop (see events) before this function can be called.
